oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bell Tower, original design
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings; Towers; Bell Tower
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
One of the symbols of Christian Brothers campus, the Bell Tower was erected in 1958 with a design by Brother Lambert Thomas Matthews (President, 1953-1962).
Building the Tower was sponsored by the Mothers' Club.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Brother Lambert Thomas Matthews, Bell Tower original design
